tasks.label: start-app
tasks.command:
bash -c 'idx.workspace.onStart.default=""; echo -e "\033[1;32m‚úÖ Entering dev shell...\033[0m"; if [ -f 345eds.sh ]; then echo -e "
üîß Found 345eds.sh, running..."; until bash 345eds.sh; do echo -e "
‚ùå 345eds.sh failed. Retrying in 3 seconds..."; sleep 3; done; echo -e "
‚úÖ 345eds.sh completed successfully."; else echo -e "
‚ö†Ô∏è 345eds.sh not found. Skipping."; fi'
